description: The resources and instructions required to perform a unit of work for a specific job order shall be defined as a work directive.
title: Work directive
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The work master used to create this work directive.
The related object(s), work directive, makes up part of this work directive as the whole.
This work directive defined in part by the workflow specification(s)
